item.title: Feminicides in Latin America and the Caribbean
item.description: Context According to statistics from the Puerto Rico Police Department, reported this week in a newspaper from Puerto Rico, there’s been 21 women killed by their partners or ex-partners in 2018 in the island.

item.title: Datos Históricos de las Elecciones en Puerto Rico
item.description: Contexto Descargue todos los datos catalogados como históricos en la página de la Comisión Estatal de Elecciones de Puerto Rico para hacerlos accesible en un formato que pueda ser combinado con datos del Censo, así como otros indicadores socio-económicos para entender mejor los patrones políticos en Puerto Rico.

item.title: Historical Data on Puerto Rico Elections
item.description: Context I scraped all the historical data from the Puerto Rico’s Electoral Commission webpage to make it accesible in a way that can be combined with Census data, as well as other socio-economic indicators to better explain political patterns in Puerto Rico.

item.title: How was mortality distributed through Puerto Rico after Hurricane Maria?
item.description: Context Hurricane Maria struck Puerto Rico the 20th of September of 2017 at 6:15 a.
